mapper.select: SELECT bid, brand, bheader, btitle, bcontent, bauthor, bdate, bimg from board where brand = #{brand} order by bdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(bid, brand, bheader, btitle, bcontent, bauthor, bdate) values (board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{brand},#{bheader},#{btitle},#{bcontent},#{bauthor}, sysdate)
insert into reply(bid, rno, rauthor, rcontent, rdate) values (#{bid}, reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{rauthor}, #{rcontent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select bid, rno, rauthor, rcontent, rdate from reply where bid = #{bid} order by rdate desc
